==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|kumbern}}, derived from the noun {{m|gmh|kumber}}, probably from {{der|de|fro|*combre|t=obstruction, barrier}}, itself probably from {{der|de|cel-gau|-}}. See {{m|de|Kummer}} for more. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|[ˈkʏ.mɐn]}} * {{audio|de|De-kümmern.ogg|Audio}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-weak|kümmert|kümmerte|gekümmert}} # {{lb|de|reflexive}} to [[take care]], to [[look after]]. #: {{ux|de|Wer '''kümmert sich''' um die Ausbildung der Lehrlinge?|Who '''takes care''' of training the interns?}} # {{lb|de|transitive}} to [[grieve]], to [[afflict]], to [[trouble]], to [[concern]]. ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-weak-ern|kümm|gekümmert|h}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|bekümmern}} * {{l|de|Kummer}} * {{l|de|verkümmern}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
